name: All Walls Must Fall - A Tech-Noir Tactics Game
description: All Walls Must Fall is a Tech-Noir Tactics game set in Berlin 2089, where the Cold War never ended.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7 Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX10 compatible video card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7 or later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 compatible video card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
